block1.title: Who we are
block1.text: We are a group of volunteers dedicated to the welfare, security and protection of animals and operate in the territory of Greece. We are a non-commercial entity and exist because of your support and your faith in us.

block2.title: What we do
block2.text: We rescue of animals that have been neglected, abused, or injured. Also we provide their furher rehabilitation rehabilitation including providing food, shelter, and medical care, as well as socialization and training At the same time we organizing events, conducting campaigns, and soliciting donations.

block3.title: Why it is so important
block3.text: We consider that animals are living beings that are capable of experiencing pain, suffering, and joy. And it is our moral and ethical responsibility to treat animals with kindness and respect, and to prevent them from unnecessary harm and cruelty. By working to protect animals, we can help to create a more just, sustainable world.
